overview: Special Topics subjects may be offered from time to time which are tailored to the interests of permanent and/ or visiting members of staff.
ilo: Explain the key issues associated with the special topic;
Analyse the relationship of the special topic to broader financial principles such as, where appropriate, asset pricing, corporate finance, market efficiency and/or empirical finance.
generic_skills: Synthesis of data and other information
Evaluation of data and other information
Accessing data and other information from a range of sources
